docs.title: Welcome to CATChem_mechanisms
docs.text: This project contains chemical mechanisms for CATChem.

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text: The mechanisms are located in the mech/ directory.

docs.title: AM4.1
docs.text:
The AM4.1 mechanism is defined by the following files:

  • species.yaml
  • reactions.yaml
  • user_rxns.yaml
  • config.yaml

These files are used by CATChem to simulate chemical processes.
